project_abstract.cdata: The Heilongjiang Dairy Project for China has two key development objectives. The first objective is to improve the financial viability of existing and new dairy operations (about 10,000 HH) in selected areas of Heilongjiang province. The second objective is to demonstrate innovative technologies to reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions and increase carbon sequestration. The project has four components. The first component is the dairy production development component, which aims to increase the scale, efficiency and quality of milk production in Heilongjiang through household and Dairy Park based production programs. The second is the dairy cattle breed improvement component, which aims at improving the genetic base of the Heilongjiang dairy herd. The third component is the environmental protection and climate change mitigation component. This Italian Trust Fund-funded activity aims to pilot and develop strategies and technologies to mitigate greenhouse gas emissions and increase carbon sequestration. The fourth project component is the project management support component, whose purpose would be to improve the management, and monitoring and evaluation of project activities.

P086629.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>黑龙江奶业项目 </ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目旨在帮助奶农提高收入，增加收入保障。项目将通过以奶农和牛奶生产基地为基础的生产规划，帮助扩大黑龙江省的牛奶生产规模、效率和质量。项目还将通过改进基因基础来提升奶牛群的质量。该项目将进一步促进发展农民专业协会，在这个牛奶加工企业占主导的行业保护农民的利益。项目还将改进农业技术推广服务，帮助农户提高产量和质量。这些工作将为黑龙江省政府提升牛奶产业和发展农村经济提供支持。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
